name: NinJump Deluxe
summary: NinJump Deluxe, the sequel to NinJump, includes all the same ninja climbing fun in entirely new settings with all new enemies and power-ups. Jump your way past sea monsters, witch doctors, snakes, monkeys, fire-breathing dragons and enemy ninjas. Collect shields and amazing new power-ups along the way. Hit three matching enemies in a row for a bonus power-up boost. How far can you get? Stay alive!
